content: in this legal case the viru county court made a final decision after 9 months the case involves kr o and r who acquired joint assets during their marriage one of the assets is a property owned solely by r the court ordered r to change the owners entry in the land register and the partners entry in the business register to reflect rs sole ownership the procedural costs will be borne by the parties involved with the republic of estonia covering the costs of krs representative the claimant requested the termination of community assets and the default judgment is immediately enforceable if the claimant wants to appeal they have 30 days to do so the defendant has the right to respond within 30 days and must pay a state fee the court will determine the distribution of procedural costs and the person who requested the determination will be responsible for paying them the court found the claim legally justified and ordered the necessary changes in the registry the defendant is responsible for the procedural costs in a previous civil case kr was granted legal aid without the obligation to pay costs so the republic of estonia will cover the costs of the representative in another ruling the court partially granted krs request for procedural assistance and determined the financial responsibilities of each party
